Part I : Sec. (I) - GAZETTE  EXTRAORDINARY  OF  THE  DEMOCRATIC  SOCIALIST  REPUBLIC OF  SRI  LANKA - 11.10.2021
1A
w;s úfYI
wxl 2249$4 - 2021 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 11 jeks i`ÿod - 2021'10'11
No.  2249/4  -   moNdAY,    october   11,   2021
EXTRAORDINARY
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government  Notifications
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
1A-  PG 5573 — 85  (10/2021)
FOREST  CONSERvATION ORDINANCE
the order under section 3 that has to be read with Section 64(1) of the Forest conservation ordinance (chapter 451) of Act, 
No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009.
The Order
bY virtue of the powers vested in me by section (3) of the Forest conservation ordinance (chapter 451) of Act, No. 13 of 1966, 
as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, I, Wimalaweera 
dissanayaka, State minister of Wildlife Protection, Adoption of Safety measures including the construction of electrical 
Fences and trenches and reforestation and Forest resources development do by this order release bogahapalassa reserved 
forest  of the extent 611.54 ha. and bounded by the limits set forth in the schedule hereto and was declared as a reserved 
forest by the 
Gazette extraordinary Notification No. 1824/20 dated 22nd August 2013 from the Reserved Forest state, from 
16th day of September 2021. 
     
 W
imalaWeera Dissanayaka,
 State minister of Wildlife Protection,
 Adoption of Safety measures including the
 construction of electrical Fences and
 trenches and reforestation and Forest
 resources development.
16th day of September,2021.
battaramulla.
State ministry of Wildlife Protection,
Adoption of Safety measures including the
construction of electrical Fences and
trenches and reforestation and Forest
resources development.
